name: VIP Customer Nurture
description: Special treatment sequence for high-value customers

steps.title: Identify VIP Customers
steps.prompt: Show me contacts with custom field 'total_orders' greater than 5 or 'lifetime_value' greater than 1000
steps.notes: Review the list to confirm VIP criteria

steps.title: Create VIP Segment
steps.prompt: Create a segment called 'vip_customers' with these criteria
steps.notes: May need to do this manually in BayEngage dashboard

steps.title: Create VIP Welcome Campaign
steps.prompt: Create campaign 'VIP Welcome' with subject 'Welcome to Our VIP Program!' using template vip_welcome for segment vip_customers

steps.title: Set Up VIP Drip Sequence
steps.prompt:
Create VIP nurture drip campaign:
- Day 3: Exclusive benefits template vip_benefits
- Day 7: Early access template vip_early_access
- Day 14: Personal shopper template vip_concierge
- Monthly: VIP only deals template vip_deals
